settings.content: Start your business journey with Kalles
[Get EComposer Page Builder for Free (only The4 users)](https://ecomposer.app/referral?ref=The4)

Use Kalles and explore all the tools and services you need to start, run, and grow your business. We know that Kalles will make your life easier by improving your workflow. With the tools that Kalles gives you, you will realize your true design potential without the need to know any coding. We would be glad if you help us to improve our theme, installation process or documentation.
[The4 Studio's](https://the4.co/) experienced team designs impressive Shopify themes that are easy to install and customize. Start your website quickly with our dedicated support.

For installation help, check our [documentation](https://support.the4.co/collections/kalles-shopify-theme) or open a [support ticket](https://support.the4.co/login). We love improving our themes, so please share any technical issues or suggestions. Thanks for being a customer!
Enjoy exclusive offers from our growing network of partners! See the list of [offers here](https://support.the4.co/user/earnings) (need login to our support system).
For expert custom development at an affordable cost, [contact The4](https://the4.co/pages/contact-us).

settings.label: t:settings_schema.general.settings.home_keywords.label
settings.default: Kalles shopify, Fastest, Ajax Shop, Minimal, Lazyload

settings.label: Enable 'product url has link collection'
settings.info: Creates a collection-aware product URL by prepending /collections/collection-handle to a product URL, where collection-handle is the handle of the collection that is currently being viewed.

settings.label: Show add to cart, select option, quick shop
Bordered style
settings.info: add borders between the products in your grid

settings.label: Enable swatch limit
settings.info: If you have too many swatches, it will grow into more than one lines, which is not desirable. Instead, we'd like to only show one line only, and show a '+X' if there are too many swatches

settings.label: Maximum color swatches to show
settings.info: Set 0 to use responsive auto number. Only works when swatch limit is enabled.

settings.label: Enter variant name you want show size list
Image hover effects
settings.info: Effects not working when has only one image: opacity, move bottom

settings.label: Enable image hover effects for first image
settings.info: Only working with effects: zoom, rotate zoom

settings.label: The longer titles instead of occupying more lines stops at the first line adding "..." at the end
Show first media
settings.info: Show first media until customers hand-pick a variant

settings.label: Use select variants by change image on slide
settings.info: Normally, variants are selected from a swatch. You might want your customers to be able to select a product variant by change a variant image. *Only active on layout has slider in product page.

settings.label: Enable historyState
settings.info: Update history state for product deeplinking shopify. It's possible to create a deep-link directly to a specific variant by adding a query string to a product page URL. You can achieve this by appending the ?variant= query parameter to the URL of the product, along with the ID of the variant. Not working when Product variant is No Pick.

settings.label: Use incoming message
settings.info: Use incoming stock transfer message when sold out.

settings.label: Variant sold out, unavailable swatches
settings.info: Removing the variants that are sold out, unavailable.

settings.label: Use a back in stock notification form
settings.info: When a customer submits the back in stock notification form for a sold out product, you will receive an email to the email address you have set up in the admin to be [your Customer email.](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0715/0505/1965/files/70427797_2747255655319783_1415233892020912128_n.jpg?v=1704340415)

settings.content: With a back in stock notification form, customers can let you know if they want to be informed when a sold out product becomes available again. When a customer uses the form to submit their email address, you will be sent information about the product that they are interested in. When more stock becomes available, you can let the customer know.
+ Metafield product countdown, Countdown to the end sale date will be shown. Be sure you have set final date of the product sale price. Namespace and key metafield: theme.countdown
+ Namespace and key metafield External/Affiliate button title: theme.external_title
+ Namespace and key metafield External/Affiliate button link: theme.external_link

settings.label: Enable automatic cart updates
settings.info: Updates the cart as soon as customer changes are made

settings.label: Min quantity cart
settings.info: Minimum quantity value in cart page/cart sidebar. For example, if you set the value to 1, the user cannot reduce it to 0.

settings.label: Action when an item is added to the cart success

options.label: No action. Stay on the current page

settings.content: Free shipping minimum amount needs to be set up as a product.

settings.label: Product shipping amount
settings.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/setting-up-shipping-rates).

settings.label: Enable confetti when got free shipping
Product Gift wrap
settings.info: Gift wrap needs to be set up as a product.
Add a link Taxes and shipping info
Add a link Terms and conditions

settings.label: Which page to show
settings.info: Choose which page to show when customers log in to your online store.

settings.content: To give your customers an easy way to create an account and gain a loyal customer base install [Growave](https://growave.io/?ref=henry_pham) that offers Social Login, Social Sharing, Instagram, Loyalty and Rewards, Reviews, Wishlist

Install [Fordeer:PDF Invoice Generator](https://apps.shopify.com/fordeer-invoice-order-printer?utm_source=the4&utm_medium=kalless&utm_campaign=order_history_page) to add print and download invoice buttons.

settings.info: Choose style of arrow for all button
settings.label: Button arrow
Search by product type
settings.info: Filter search results with product type

settings.label: Search only products
settings.info: Only returns products in the search results
To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

settings.content: To work on translations, install a translations app that's compatible with selling in multiple languages. [Visit the Shopify App Store](https://apps.shopify.com/collections/apps-for-store-languages)
Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

settings.label: Enable Customer Geolocation
settings.info: Boost up your sales by showing your prices in the Visitor's Currency! When a customer goes to your store, your store chooses the currency to use based on the geolocation of their IP address. The prices in your storefront and checkout convert immediately to that currency. If a customer's location uses a currency that isn't supported by your store, then the store's currency is used. For example, your store currency is USD and you accept USD, EUR, and YEN. When a customer from Brazil visits your store, they see prices in USD (your store's currency) because you don't accept payments in BRL.

settings.content: This feature is only available for stores using Shopify Payments. Multi currency checkout page. My See [Can I use Shopify Payments?](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/shopify-payments-requirements#can-I-use-shopify-payments) for a list of supported countries. [Learn more about multi-currency here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency)

Your customers can pay for their orders and receive refunds in their local currency. [Enabling your store to sell in multiple currencies](https://help.shopify.com/manual/payments/multi-currency/setup).
To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.
To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://support.the4.co/articles/language-currency).

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: EUR - EUR | USD - USD | GBP - GBP
settings.placeholder: EUR - Euro | USD - US Dollar | GBP - British Pound
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a '|'.

settings.label: Checkout currency notification
settings.info: This notification will appear on the cart page,shopping cart widget. It is meant to inform your customers that Shopify only allows them to Checkout in your shop's main currency.

settings.label: Currency notification text:
settings.info: [original_currency], [current_currency] is is the variable name will automatically be replaced you must not change.
settings.default: All charges are billed in [original_currency]. While the content of your cart is currently displayed in [current_currency], the checkout will use [original_currency] at the most current exchange rate.

settings.label: Enable original price on hover
settings.info: If your customer hovers over the converted prices he will still be able to see the price in your shop's main currency.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Favicon retina image
settings.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 152 x 152px
